name: D E A D C R A F T EP. 0
shortName: D E A D C R A F T EP. 0
description:
Update Ending updated to fit release of Ep 1 Localized Version Uploaded Story: The year is 2112

U.E.D (united.earth.drilling) corporation has monopolized on the gathering of raw ore and metals.

U.E.D uses large mining vessels known as Leviathans to extract earths most rarest of resources by extracting them from other planets.

U.E.D reach is far and has even bought and sold military power.

Sense U.E.D has begun they have become the driving force behind mankind and has pushed man into its most fruitful era.

Until now.

Dead Craft Episode Zero: The Arrival \*Status: Final\* UPDATE: Localized Version uploaded. FEATURES: Cinematic Map No Playable Features
